org: Italian Institute of Technology, AI Lab Unige
role: Research Intern and Software Engineer - Robotics Lab
project: Context aware verifiable and adaptive dynamic deliberation

body.raw:
- Extended robotics modules and added a monitoring framework on the IIT R1 robot for RobMoSys.
- Integrated RML and a Prolog oracle for reasoning and verification to improve safety in human robot interaction.
